subject: Suite 3 Design Premium $269.90
body:
There isn't any finer folks living than a Republican that votes the Democratic ticket.

A good farmer is nothing more nor less than a handy man with a sense of humus.

Every animal knows more than you do.

Building a better you is the first step to building a better America.


But what we call our despair is often only the painful eagerness of unfed hope.

Content is a word unknown to life it is also a word unknown to man.

Death is delightful. Death is dawn, the waking from a weary night of fevers unto truth and light.

Criticism, as it was first instituted by Aristotle, was meant as a standard of judging well.

Logic! Good gracious! What rubbish! How can I tell what I think till I see what I say?

Failure is a detour, not a dead-end street.

Produce great men, the rest follows.

The lonely one offers his hand too quickly to whomever he encounters.


No one can keep his grieves in their prime they use themselves up.
